author: intrepid42
body:
#### PR description:

Several nanoAod workflows crashed when multi-thread jobs were running both Rivet-based ParticleLevelProducer and HTXSRivetProducer.
This PR prevents Rivet-based modules to be executed at the same time.

#### PR validation:

Updated modules tested on Higgs and non-Higgs sample. All Rivet modules run together within a test job using 10 threads, no crash after 10k events (the old versions crashed after a few events). Output is as expected.
title: Prevent simultaneous execution of Rivet modules
